_header: Lawrence well the name has taken
Subjects: Lawrence, saints, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Lawrence, in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
lawrent vele þe name has taneof a fare tre callit
                    lawrcane…
CULGg26.Note:
Begins on loose folio; ff. 148-9 loose as second halves of two loose
                    bifolia shelved as Gg.2.6A(c); other halves are ff. 134-45. See 4809 and 6032.

Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.

             Scottish Text Society
